To celebrate its Tricentenaire, Martell hosted a spectacular evening at the birthplace of French Art de Vivre, the Palace of Versailles.
MARTELL CORDON
BLEU 300
A tribute to Martell’s 300-year anniversary
Discover a unique version of the legendary cognac Martell Cordon Bleu.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/cognacs/cordon-blue-300]]> TASTE <[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/cognacs/cordon-bleu-300]]>
BACK IN 1715
Take a journey through Martell’s 300 years of history - the oldest cognac house in France.
